title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1456/85 of 31 May 1985 fixing the 1985/86 marketing year for cherries in syrup
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1456/85
of 31 May 1985
fixing the 1985/86 marketing year for cherries in syrup
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: Notwithstanding Article 2a (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 516/77 the 1985/86 marketing year for cherries in syrup falling within subheading 20.06 B of the Common Customs Tariff shall run from 27 May 1985 to 9 May 1986.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 May 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 73, 21. 3. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 81, 23. 3. 1985, p. 10.
